description: Situated at the top of a steep slope in Fossombrone’s beautiful historic centre, this osteria takes guests back to the 1920s thanks to its romantic decor. Here, having risen through the culinary ranks, the owner-chef makes full use of his expert techniques to create dishes that hover between tradition and a sense of fantasy using the best seasonal ingredients that the region has to offer. The concise wine list favours micro-producers and natural wines.
